verbs.description: In the wake of Tuesday ’s revelations about millions of dollars [V: being] paid by several companies to Michael Cohen , which looked an awful lot like selling access to Trump , we have the first report of an inside source at one such company , Novartis , being approached by Cohen for that exact quid pro quo exchange . Stat News …
